C Section

Laura Mullen



Elsie and her favorite
Have fallen in love
With the word
Transparency they
Would like me to call
A meeting in order
To watch us talking
They smile and nod
And their eyes are so
Angry as they say
They just want “to be
In the room with all
The creative people”
As we discuss what
They call our problem
If you want to be
In that number
Come see me
